name: Spikes (Kottler)
description:
A small 'puzzle' game where you have to get to the portal in order to move to the next room.

There are 22 levels to beat and you can try to get the best times too.

Controls:

- Arrow keys to move.

- R to restart from level 1.

- Spacebar to mute music.

You can try the game in the browser or download it for windows for a better result.
